Ingredients.2: 3 tablespoons hickory smoke seasoning (such as Savory Spice® Red Rocks)

Ingredients.3: 1 rack frozen baby back ribs, membrane removed and cut into 4 slabs

Directions.1: Pour water into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot). Set the trivet inside.

Directions.2: Sprinkle hickory smoke seasoning liberally over frozen ribs; set ribs on top of the trivet. Close and lock the lid.

Directions.3: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set the timer for 45 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.4: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 15 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid.

Directions.5: Preheat the oven broiler. Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source.

Directions.6: Transfer ribs to a rimmed baking sheet. Brush with barbecue sauce. Broil until glazed, 4 to 5 minutes.
